original_title: Best health and wellness category award clinched by Mawanella Medical Center
original_body_lines: Mawanella Medical Center, which has served the people of Mawanella for 14 years, won the Year 2022 Pinnacle Sri Lanka Award for the best health and wellness of the year. The awards ceremony was held at Water’s Edge in Battaramulla. Dr. Kamal Dharmawansha founded the Mawanella Medical Center. During the Covid epidemic, the Centre continued to provide healthcare to the patients in the area at affordable rates without closing its doors.
